original_title: Three Minutes of a Headless Life
overview: A stop motion animation shot on 16 mm black and white film. A wig wanders through a variety of texts and ideologies. She stumbles upon photos of Iranian writers and poets such as Forough Farokhzad, critical thinkers and philosophers such as Michel Foucault, and Dadaist artists such as Marcel Duchamp.
title: Three Minutes of a Headless Life
